title.text: An English Grammar Checker as a Writing Aid for Students of English as a Second Language

introductionContent.text: We present a prototype grammar checker for English as a Second Language (ESL) students, utilizing Combinatory Categorial Grammar (CCG) written in SICStus Prolog.

Instead of attempting to handle all possible grammatical errors, the grammar checker identifies certain specific types of grammatical mistakes that appear more regularly than others in the present domain of application.
